description: The Red Delicious Apple (Malus 'Red Delicious') is a sweet and juicy apple variety that is loved by all. The bright, crisp outer skin belies the tender flesh and sweet flavour of the Red Delicious. It is one of the oldest and most beloved varieties of apples in the world, and is easy to spot in the grocery stores. The flavour of Red Delicious is perfect for fresh pies, cakes, sauces, and ciders. It's a great snack for any occasion, and is also a reliable pick for lunchbox treats. The Red Delicious Apple is amazing for its sweet and crunchy qualities, as well as its long shelf life.
